content.text:
# List of current ships of the Islamic Republic of Iran Navy

This list shows ships of the mainline Iranian Navy, and does not include the vessels of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps Navy. The IRIS prefix is short for Islamic Republic of Iran Ship.
